channel.title: Robert French on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Robert French on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: How do you find real lack and real passion?
item.description: RF - Dr Robert French On 24th October 2016 at the University of Strathclyde in Glasgow, Dr Robert French lead an Iriss workshop exploring how to negotiate a way through the complexities of our managed world, in order to do some of the worthwhile things we feel passionate about. In this talk he includes examples from his own experience of the school education system in England, the Poet John Keats and the text 'Symposium' by the Classical Greek philosopher, Plato.
